text: more context for this:point_up_2::skin-tone-2:… this is for a custom theme, and I have the correct extends statement in the child theme’s `theme.json` file and I copied the parent theme’s `fields.json`  to the child theme’s `fields.json` file. The field values in css are now blank :slightly_frowning_face:
John. Add a new field to the fields.json file and reference it in the template. See if it works.
should it have the other fields in there as well? It currently does
No I mean. Add a new one that the parent fields.jason doesn't have.

For the love of pete!
I think I had 2 DM tabs open and it never published the fields.json as the revision history shows empty on every instance. I just had to publish and now it works :man-facepalming::skin-tone-2:
